title: Serious Ranked Team
body:
So here we are. The end of season 5. Some people reached their Ranked goals, many, like myself, did not. While I know I'm not the best player it just always felt like we lost simply because of a complete lack of communication.

So for season 6 I'm going to give Ranked Teams a try. I'm looking for players Bronze III to mid Silver (higher leveled people are welcome too, should anybody want to carry).

My goal for this team is to have 8-10 people who can play 2 roles well and at least 2 champions in that role well whilst being adaptable (for example if you can only play Darius and Garen its not always easy for you to adapt to the requirements of a specific game).

I myself am a jungle main, playing Ammumu and Vi, with Top as my secondary role, where I play Hecarim and Jax. 
I'm looking for another person (or people) that can fulfill my roles should I be unable to play and players for all other roles (once again, an 8-10 man team).

This is also going to be more than just a team. Teams work best once you actually get to know the other members well. There will be a group chat (on Skype most likely) which we can use to communicate. This can be used for personal stuff (without being creepy about it), theory crafting or sharing a funny vid on YouTube with your league friends. 

Big point though: if you make other team members angry or flame them or put them down you will be kicked. There is a one strike policy for dick heads.

So, who's in? :D

replies.body:
Hey, I am silver 4 
IGN: LordBelgarion
I am an adc main but can play all roles decently and would like to join your team :)

Hello.
I was in Bronze 1, but have been demoted due to trolls.
Now I'm in Bronze 4 and want to rank up to at least silver.
I can go any lane, but more preferably Jg/Mid/Top
Hit me up: Coldesac.
Still deciding on a name BTW, any suggestions are most welcome :)
